doc.name: AbstractLayoutConfiguration
doc.description: An attribute for parameters of automatic layout. This is read by the KIELER layout action to generate a configuration for the layout algorithm.
doc.author: Miro Spoenemann, Christoph Daniel Schulze, Ulf Rueegg
doc.property: Whether to use Ptolemy's original layout algorithm.
Whether to include unconnected nodes such as comments.
The overall spacing between graph elements.
The aspect ratio for placement of connected components (logarithmic).
Mode of user interaction: whether user positioning is allowed to affect the layout.
Customized help file to be displayed by the layout configuration dialog.
